question_text: Task assigned with a two-day deadline.
option_a: I plan milestones, start early, and deliver on time.
option_b: I procrastinate and risk missing the deadline.

option_a: I tidy my area and set a simple clean-up norm.
option_b: I leave items scattered and ignore the mess.

option_a: I keep precise records and reconcile transactions.
option_b: I spend without logging and hope it balances later.

option_a: I break it into subtasks and track progress visibly.
option_b: I start haphazardly without a plan.

option_a: I renegotiate early and update the schedule.
I define acceptance criteria and verify before submit.
option_b: I submit minimal work without checks.

option_a: I propose a brief agenda and action items.
option_b: I attend unprepared and let it drift.

option_a: I follow privacy rules and least-access practices.
option_b: I share data casually without safeguards.

option_a: I read the quickstart and document tips.
option_b: I avoid learning it and ask others to do tasks.

question_text: Missed a small step that caused rework.
option_a: I add a checklist to prevent the error again.
option_b: I ignore the root cause and move on.
